author: asmuts
msg: Got simple clustering working.  Will clean later.
Cluster puts to other clusters and is configurable to keep other local in synch.
Clusters do not get from other clusters.
Cluster servers communicate through the server and not the listener.
Group cache locks up in cluster mode.  Will fix.

author: asmuts
msg: Working on clustering.  Can keep remotes consistent, need to add option to keep all locals in a cluster consistent.  This is a bit tricky.

author: asmuts
msg: Adding some old documentation.  It's better than nothing.  Will supplement and replace when we develop a doc format.

The jcs vs. osc4j needs to be updated.
